verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָזָ֔ה <S%H2372><s%> did see יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3470><s%> which Isaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמֽוֹץ׃ <S%H531><s%> of Amoz

עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mountain נִשְׁפֶּה֙ <S%H8192><s%> upon the high שְֽׂאוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> Lift ye up נֵ֔ס <S%H5251><s%> a banner הָרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> exalt ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice לָהֶ֑ם הָנִ֣יפוּ <S%H5130><s%> unto them shake יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> the hand וְיָבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> that they may go פִּתְחֵ֥י <S%H6607><s%> into the gates נְדִיבִֽים׃ <S%H5081><s%> of the nobles

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I צִוֵּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> I have commanded לִמְקֻדָּשָׁ֑י <S%H6942><s%> my sanctified ones גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> have even קָרָ֤אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I have also called גִבּוֹרַי֙ <S%H1368><s%> my mighty ones לְאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> for mine anger עַלִּיזֵ֖י <S%H5947><s%> [even] them that rejoice גַּאֲוָתִֽי׃ <S%H1346><s%> in my highness

ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The noise הָמ֛וֹן <S%H1995><s%> of a multitude בֶּֽהָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains דְּמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> like as עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> of a great ק֠וֹל <S%H6963><s%> noise שְׁא֞וֹן <S%H7588><s%> a tumultuous מַמְלְכ֤וֹת <S%H4467><s%> of the kingdoms גּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> of nations נֶֽאֱסָפִ֔ים <S%H622><s%> gathered together יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts מְפַקֵּ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> mustereth צְבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> the host מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> of the battle

בָּאִ֛ים <S%H935><s%> They come מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country מֶרְחָ֖ק <S%H4801><s%> from a far מִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> from the end הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [even] the LORD וּכְלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> and the weapons זַעְמ֔וֹ <S%H2195><s%> of his indignation לְחַבֵּ֖ל <S%H2254><s%> to destroy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the whole land

הֵילִ֕ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> Howl כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָר֖וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] at hand י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ye for the day יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּשֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> as a destruction מִשַּׁדַּ֥י <S%H7706><s%> from the Almighty יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> it shall come

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יָדַ֣יִם <S%H3027><s%> Therefore shall all hands תִּרְפֶּ֑ינָה <S%H7503><s%> be faint וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every לְבַ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> heart אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> and every man's יִמָּֽס׃ <S%H4549><s%> shall melt

וְֽנִבְהָ֓לוּ ׀ <S%H926><s%> And they shall be afraid צִירִ֤ים <S%H6735><s%> pangs וַֽחֲבָלִים֙ <S%H2256><s%> and sorrows יֹֽאחֵז֔וּן <S%H270><s%> shall take hold כַּיּוֹלֵדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> as a woman that travaileth יְחִיל֑וּן <S%H2342><s%> of them they shall be in pain אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> at another יִתְמָ֔הוּ <S%H8539><s%> they shall be amazed פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> their faces לְהָבִ֖ים <S%H3851><s%> [shall be as] flames פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> their faces

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> Behold the day יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּ֔א <S%H935><s%> cometh אַכְזָרִ֥י <S%H394><s%> cruel וְעֶבְרָ֖ה <S%H5678><s%> both with wrath וַחֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> and fierce אָ֑ף <S%H639><s%> anger לָשׂ֤וּם <S%H7760><s%> to lay הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the land לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8047><s%> desolate וְחַטָּאֶ֖יהָ <S%H2400><s%> the sinners יַשְׁמִ֥יד <S%H8045><s%> and he shall destroy מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כוֹכְבֵ֤י <S%H3556><s%> For the stars הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וּכְסִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3685><s%> and the constellations לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will not יָהֵ֖לּוּ <S%H1984><s%> thereof shall not give אוֹרָ֑ם <S%H216><s%> their light חָשַׁ֤ךְ <S%H2821><s%> shall be darkened הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> the sun בְּצֵאת֔וֹ <S%H3318><s%> in his going forth וְיָרֵ֖חַ <S%H3394><s%> and the moon לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יַגִּ֥יהַ <S%H5050><s%> to shine אוֹרֽוֹ׃ <S%H216><s%> shall not cause her light

וּפָקַדְתִּ֤י <S%H6485><s%> And I will punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and תֵּבֵל֙ <S%H8398><s%> the world רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> for [their] evil וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רְשָׁעִ֖ים <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked עֲוֹנָ֑ם <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <S%H7673><s%> to cease גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> and I will cause the arrogancy זֵדִ֔ים <S%H2086><s%> of the proud וְגַאֲוַ֥ת <S%H1346><s%> the haughtiness עָרִיצִ֖ים <S%H6184><s%> of the terrible אַשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <S%H8213><s%> and will lay low

אוֹקִ֥יר <S%H3365><s%> more precious אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> he מִפָּ֑ז <S%H6337><s%> than fine gold וְאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> even a man מִכֶּ֥תֶם <S%H3800><s%> than the golden wedge אוֹפִֽיר׃ <S%H211><s%> of Ophir

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens אַרְגִּ֔יז <S%H7264><s%> Therefore I will shake וְתִרְעַ֥שׁ <S%H7493><s%> shall remove הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth מִמְּקוֹמָ֑הּ <S%H4725><s%> out of her place בְּעֶבְרַת֙ <S%H5678><s%> in the wrath יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וּבְי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and in the day חֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> of his fierce אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> anger

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּצְבִ֣י <S%H6643><s%> roe מֻדָּ֔ח <S%H5080><s%> And it shall be as the chased וּכְצֹ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> and as a sheep וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> none מְקַבֵּ֑ץ <S%H6908><s%> that no man taketh up אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> they shall every man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עַמּוֹ֙ <S%H5971><s%> to his own people יִפְנ֔וּ <S%H6437><s%> turn וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אַרְצ֖וֹ <S%H776><s%> into his own land יָנֽוּסוּ׃ <S%H5127><s%> and flee

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Anyone הַנִּמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> Every one that is found יִדָּקֵ֑ר <S%H1856><s%> shall be thrust through וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and anyone הַנִּסְפֶּ֖ה <S%H5595><s%> and every one that is joined יִפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> [unto them] shall fall בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> by the sword

וְעֹלְלֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5768><s%> Their children יְרֻטְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H7376><s%> also shall be dashed to pieces לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> before their eyes יִשַּׁ֙סּוּ֙ <S%H8155><s%> shall be spoiled בָּֽתֵּיהֶ֔ם <S%H1004><s%> their houses וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> and their wives [תִּשָּׁגַלְנָה כ] (תִּשָּׁכַֽבְנָה׃ <S%H7693><s%> lie with ק)

הִנְנִ֛י <S%H2005><s%> I am going מֵעִ֥יר <S%H5782><s%> Behold I will stir up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָדָ֑י <S%H4074><s%> the Medes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Who כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> silver לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יַחְשֹׁ֔בוּ <S%H2803><s%> against them which shall not regard וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and [as for] gold לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יַחְפְּצוּ־ <S%H2654><s%> they shall not delight בֽוֹ׃

וּקְשָׁת֖וֹת <S%H7198><s%> [Their] bows נְעָרִ֣ים <S%H5288><s%> the young men תְּרַטַּ֑שְׁנָה <S%H7376><s%> to pieces וּפְרִי־ <S%H6529><s%> on the fruit בֶ֙טֶן֙ <S%H990><s%> of the womb לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> even יְרַחֵ֔מוּ <S%H7355><s%> and they shall have no pity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> children לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תָח֥וּס <S%H2347><s%> shall not spare עֵינָֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> their eye

וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become בָבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> And Babylon צְבִ֣י <S%H6643><s%> the glory מַמְלָכ֔וֹת <S%H4467><s%> of kingdoms תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> the beauty גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> excellency כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldees' כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֣ת <S%H4114><s%> overthrew אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> shall be as when God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סְדֹ֖ם <S%H5467><s%> Sodom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמֹרָֽה׃ <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor תֵשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> be inhabited לָנֶ֔צַח <S%H5331><s%> It shall never וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <S%H7931><s%> neither shall it be dwelt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> in from generation וָד֑וֹר <S%H1755><s%> to generation וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַהֵ֥ל <S%H167><s%> pitch tent שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there עֲרָבִ֔י <S%H6163><s%> neither shall the Arabian וְרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> there neither shall the shepherds לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַרְבִּ֥צוּ <S%H7257><s%> make their fold שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְרָבְצוּ־ <S%H7257><s%> shall lie שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there צִיִּ֔ים <S%H6728><s%> But wild beasts of the desert וּמָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> shall be full בָתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> there and their houses אֹחִ֑ים <S%H255><s%> of doleful creatures וְשָׁ֤כְנוּ <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> first יַֽעֲנָ֔ה <S%H3284><s%> Ostriches וּשְׂעִירִ֖ים <S%H8163><s%> there and satyrs יְרַקְּדוּ־ <S%H7540><s%> shall dance שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְעָנָ֤ה <S%H6030><s%> shall cry אִיִּים֙ <S%H338><s%> And the wild beasts of the islands בְּאַלְמנוֹתָ֔יו <S%H490><s%> in their desolate houses וְתַנִּ֖ים <S%H8577><s%> and dragons בְּהֵ֣יכְלֵי <S%H1964><s%> palaces עֹ֑נֶג <S%H6027><s%> in [their] pleasant וְקָר֤וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] near לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> to come עִתָּ֔הּ <S%H6256><s%> and her time וְיָמֶ֖יהָ <S%H3117><s%> and her days לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִמָּשֵֽׁכוּ׃ <S%H4900><s%> shall not be prolonged
